inn1.comm: in the channel outside off stump, moving away and he shoulders arms to the keeper
in the channel outside off and he leaves that one alone as well, just a hint of away movement
outside the off stump again and he leaves it be
this one's really wide and Tharanga reached for it but couldn't make contact, called a wide
much closer this time and has a bit of away movement, left alone again
gets him to drive this time, a bit of away swing this time, lands full as Tharanga tries to drive but just goes past the outside edge
opens the face slightly there and guides it to third man for a single
ooh, beaten with the moving ball, it just shaped away to go past the outside edge as Tharanga poked at it
pushed off the front foot past the bowler for a quick single
brilliant delivery! The late swing accounting for Chandimal, bowled quick, angled in towards middle and then swung away late to beat the bat a Chandimal closed the face and knocked back off stump
over the wicket, on a good length on the off and he rocks forward to tap it into the off side
pitched on a good length and Thirimanne doesn't take too long to get going, leans forward and crunches that sweetly through extra cover for a boundary
on middle this time, much straighter, flicked through square leg for a couple more runs this time
pitched on a length on the off and it's driven soundly down the ground past mid-off for a couple
short of a good length on the off, nips away and he takes the bottom hand off that one, takes the outside edge and rolls down to third man for a single
slightly short on leg stump, whipped behind square for a single into the deep
getting it to shape away again, opens the face slightly to run that towards third man for a single
lands on a good length and Thirimanne meets it solidly playing it towards mid-off
beaten, and that goes between gully and first slip, Boult getting it to dart away and Thirimanne gets a thick outside edge as he tries to withdraw from that one, lucky to get a boundary
lands on leg stump and that's turned behind square into the deep for a single
banged in short and he latches onto it quickly, swivels and pulls it hard over square leg for a boundary
goodish length on middle, pushes it towards mid-on and he clinches a quick single
pitched on a length on middle and that's driven sweetly towards mid-off
pitched on a length again on middle and off and he presents the straight bat to drive it to mid-off
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends it towards point from the crease

dropped, toughie, pitched up, lovely delivery that moved away just a hint, he tried to drive down the line, got a thin edge and Watling dived low to his left but couldn't hold on, was dying on him and he put in a good effort
beaten again, swinging away, inviting him to drive but Tharanga can't make contact as he reaches forward to drive
much more width on that one, in the slot outside off stump and he caresses that through the covers for a boundary
in the channel outside off and be brings this one back in, shoulders arms to let that through
sliding down the leg side as he tried to turn it square, struck on the pads
slices that one through cover, pitched up from Boult and he reached for it but got it into the gap, though it was a little uppish, four more
bowled that one in the corridor, enough width for Tharanga to leave that one alone
shoulders arms to that one as well, keeps its line and goes through to the keeper
bowled on a good length, gets forward and taps that one into the off side
good carry through to Watling, borderline case for a wide but isn't called, the batsman didn't bother chasing that one
angling in towards middle and leg and that;s been played towards midwicket

Southee strikes! Tempting him with a good length ball outside off, a bit of width there and he was drawn into playing a drive, got a thin edge as it went across and Watling took a comfortable catch this time
fullish outside off and that's been played into the off side for a single
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and knocks it down into the leg side
on a good length, moves on the back foot and punches it towards mid-off
short of a good length this time, moves back and defends it solidly towards cover

Three down, it seemed like a slightly belated decision from Mathews to go for the pull, not much intent in that shot, Boult dropped it short outside off and it came on to him a little quickly as well, got a top edge and Southee judged it well at fine leg
sliced to third man, full and wide and he guides that uppishly to third man for a single
in the channel outside off, just a hint of away movement there and goes past the outside edge
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it down to short point where McCullum's standing
drops it short on the leg stump and he helps it on its way wide of fine leg, oh actually leg-byes, clipped the pads then
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and defends it to extra cover
short of a good length and he chops it down towards point from the crease
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it towards point
still getting some away swing, pitched on a good length, gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
short of a good length, knocks it down in front of point and calls for a quick single
short of a good length outside off and it nips away, Tharanga tries to chop that behind point, just goes past the outside edge
banged in short outside off, sways out of the way to let that one go through
short of a good length, gets on the back foot, gets right behind that one, and taps it into the off side
goodish length and he drives that one towards point where McCullum fields
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot does Sangakkara and punches that to mid-on
drops that one short on leg stump and it's a wide down the leg side in the end
shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends that one to point
bowled on a good length outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
bowled it full on middle, that one's driven wide of mid-on for a single
short of a good length outside off and that's been left alone to the keeper
shortish outside off, carries well to the keeper and he leaves that one alone
bowls that full on middle and that's driven towards mid-on from the crease
slightly short of a good length outside off and it's left alone to the keeper
a thick inside edge from Sanga there as he tried to play that into the on-side, gets it past square leg for a single
pushed that one firmly towards mid-off, send back the non-striker just in time, there was no single there
on a good length on middle and off, defended firmly towards mid-off
on a good length, draws him into playing the drive again, misses as it moves away to beat the outside edge
coming round the wicket, goodish length first up, gets it to turn away and he leaves that one be
flighted on the off and it's driven back to the bowler
floating it on middle, turned past mid-on for a single
floating it on the off stump, drives it in the direction of mid-off for another single
quicker through the air, on the off stump and it'd pushed towards extra cover
pushed away into the leg side for a single
on a good length and he lets that one go through to the keeper, holds its line
Bond, the bowling coach, will like that, ooh, nipped away, landed on middle and moved away across as Sanga tried to turn the face slightly on that one, got an edge and Watling took it easily
short of a good length, bowled at 125.7kmph, gets on the back foot and defends it straight to the bowler
gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the off side for a quick single
yorker length this time from Milne, dug out towards point from the crease
back of a length on middle, rocks back and opens the face to play it down to third man for a single
floating it on middle and that's been driven back to the bowler
tossed up this time, slowed it up as well, drives it straight to mid-on from the crease
angling in towards middle, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off and he goes after it, tries to drive it through cover, gets a thick outside edge well wide of the slip fielder for a couple of runs
bowled it flat this time and it's pushed firmly towards extra cover
flighted just outside off and it's driven straight to extra cover this time
pitched up outside off, drives that one straight towards mid-off
a bit of width on that one, he opened the face to play it towards point
goodish length and he manages to squeeze that between point and cover for a couple of runs to bring up the 50 for the team
drops that short on the off and it's dragged towards fine leg for a single
hmm, a bit of swing there for Milne, pitched up on a length outside off, drives it towards mid-off
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to extra cover
just outside off,Jayawardene gets outside the line and turns it behind square
waits for that one to turn in and he pushes it towards midwicket
Tharanga stepped out of the crease, tossed up and he drove it uppishly wide of Nathan McCullum, there is a long-off in place, a single
shortish outside off, flat and didn't turn, pushed through point for a single
floating it on middle from round the wicket, pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up, lands full and leg and it's driven through midwicket into the deep for a single
short of a length outside off and Tharanga cashes in on the width, cut away hard through point for a boundary
full toss outside off and it's steered through point into the deep for a couple of runs
beaten this time, gets it to move away from a good length, gets on the back foot to defend but was almost done in by the away movement
that took him by surprise, that slipped out of his hand but don't think that was above waist-height, Milne put his hand up to apologise
rocks back and taps it towards point

run-out attempt, smart work from Milne, driven firmly to Milne who blackflipped it with his left hand onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, Jayawardene though was alert and had made it back in time
turned away for a single into the leg side
flighted on middle, drives it straight to extra cover
floating it on middle, tries to defend it into the off side, this one seemed to hold its line, got an inside edge onto the pads
floating it on middle, drives it back to the bowler
flighted on middle, drives that one back to the bowler down the pitch
pushed it through quicker, drives it straight to extra cover
Milne beats Jayawardene, that one moved away from short of a good length and Jayawardene poked at it off the front foot
edged and past slip to the third-man boundary, was in the channel and Jayawardene pushed loosely at that one, fell short of Taylor, and wide, and went past him as he dived to his right
the legcutter, superbly done, short of a good length outside off, Jayawardene flirted with it and missed
appeal for lbw, Jayawardene moved across to flick it square but missed, was struck on the pads, that would have gone down the leg side though
full outside off and that's pushed sweetly towards mid-on, no run there, straight to the fielder
drops it short on middle and it's elegantly pulled away to fine leg for a single
Jayawardene clears mid-on, was flighted and he sensed a chance, danced down the track and launched him over the in-field for a one-bounce four
gets outside the line and turns it square for a single
Tharanga clears the in-field as well but not as convincingly as Mahela had done, came down the track and chipped him over midwicket, had enough on it to take it to the ropes
yorked himself there, bowled on a length on middle and he ended up digging it out into the off side
nicely chipped, over extra cover but only for a single this time
floating it outside off, turned through square leg for a single
on middle and leg, turned through square leg for a single
fired it short on middle and he drops it back to the bowler
a bit of width this time and he cracks it through point into the deep for a single
gets forward and turns it behind square for one more
shortish on the off, chops it behind point for a single
shortish on the off, gets across and works it through square for a single to keep strike, five off it
angling in towards middle, tickled through square leg into the deep for a single
bowled on a good length on the off, defended towards point from the crease
slower one this time, bowled on a length towards off stump and it's struck straight to extra cover
tried to play that delicately down to third man but it just went past the outside edge
drops that one short outside off and he lets that one go
short of a good length on middle, punched towards extra cover from the crease
ooh, chipped that one back, wide of Nicol, fell short though, just the single as it went past him
shortish outside off, bowled flat, cut straight to point
width and it's chipped again, in the vacant cover region for a single
gets front and across and turns it through midwicket for a single
short on the off and he latches onto it, drags that over midwicket, yawning gap in the deep and he finds it, a boundary
pushed through quicker outside off, tried to cut that past point, missed

Run-out, Superb fielding by Nathan McCullum, Jayawardene tapped it wide of extra cover and called for a single, was running to the non-striker's end, McCullum picked it with his left hand, shifted the ball to his right hand, turned and threw down the stumps to find Jayawardene well short of his ground
on a good length outside off and that's square-driven through point into the deep for a single
into the off side, called for a single but is sent back, Ellis went up to the stumps and tried to collect the throw but missed, Mendis was back in the crease
outside off, lands on a good length and it's been left alone
much closer to the stumps this time and he leaves that one be as well

Mendis will be livid, and he should be! So much width and he went after that immediately, short and wide and he tried to slash that over point, got a thick edge and was caught by Taylor at first slip, the umpires are checking for a front-foot no-ball are they? Well, Mendis is walking and Sri Lanka are now in bigger trouble
steps forward and defends him to point, calls for a single but it's not there
edged and short of slip, enticing him with that tossed up ball, got a thick edge and fell just short of slip there
floating it on middle, defends that one towards midwicket
flighted outside off, drives it down to long-off for a single
tossed up, driven uppishly into the deep on the off side for a single
short of a good length outside off, crunched off the back foot to point
drops that one short outside off stump, called a wide, too high there
slower one bowled short on middle and that's struck well, jabbed it over midwicket, well timed and found the gap, raises the 100 for Sri Lanka
short of a good length outside off, chops that one down towards point
short of a good length again, tries to slash that through point, misses
bowled that full outside off and he slices that over the in-field, towards deep point for a couple of runs, moves to 49
excellent way to bring up his half-century, absolutely thrashed that straight, over the bowler's head, past the umpire, for a boundary
angling in towards middle, pushes that one down the pitch
flighted on middle, got a leading edge as he tried to turn the face, got it past extra cover for a single
angling in towards middle, pushes that inside out wide of extra cover for a single
shortish on the off, stopped on him a little, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
pushes it down the ground to long-off for a single
chips that towards deep cover for a single, he's played that shot a few times today
short of a good length outside off, runs that down to third man for a single
picks the gap, lovely shot, short of a good length, Perera stands tall and punches that through extra  cover for a boundary
drags that one short and he lets that one go through to the keeper
the boundaries keep flowing, Perera thwacks that short delivery over midwicket, dropped it short and he dispatched it for a one-bounce four

Perera goes! Ellis had a deep square leg in place, Perera again went for the pull and went much squarer this time, Milne was waiting for that shot in the deep, moved a few paces to his right and took it well
short of a good length and it's pushed straight to extra cover
good bounce, short of a good length, tried to upper-cut that but missed
the shot pays off this time, not quite an upper-cut but used the pace of the ball well there, short of a good length and he guides it past the diving third-man fielder to the boundary

Southee picks up his third wicket, Tharanga goes just as the rain comes down, short of a length and he was trying to repeat that shot though trying to get it more past point, got an edge and Watling dived full length to his right and took it one-handed, good take and Sri Lanka are in danger of getting bowled out soon here
